CatDescriptText: Dillard Carter, Butcher, Centre Avenue Thorofare Market,1121 Brushton Avenue, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 26, 1958, pg. 6 with question: "Do you believe the trouble in Middle East will start an atomic world war?" answer reads: "No, I don't believe so. I believe Russia will back down."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Dillard Carter, wearing moustache, light colored short sleeve shirt, and light colored apron, standing with hands on hips in interior, possibly Thorofare Market, with light colored walls and meat hook with barrel underneath
